reviewText:
This is a really good edition as well, following up the 1990 edition!
Now hard to find, the 1991 Video Playmate Calendar has the following PLAYMATES included ~
* TINA BOCKRATH
* RENEE TENISON
* KAREN FOSTER
* HELLE MICHAELSON
* ERIKA ELENIAK
* BONNIE MARINO
* PAMELA ANDERSON
* PEGGY McINTAGGART
* LISA MATTHEWS
* DEBORAH DRIGGS
* PETRA VERKAIK
* JACQUELINE SHEEN

This Playboy video contains some of the best clips from Playboy ever. If you're a playmates fan you owe it to yourself to see (my favorite videos of)Petra Verkaik, Helle Michaelsen, Karen Foster, Pamela Anderson and Jacqueline Sheen. The music is good and the camera work excellent.
